snippet: Mr. Patterson was a Pulitzer Prize winner who fought racial injustice in his columns for The Atlanta Constitution and was later an editor at The Washington Post and The St. Petersburg Times.
abstract: Eugene C Patterson, Pulitzer Prize-winning editor, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Patterson was a Pulitzer Prize winner who fought racial injustice in his columns for The Atlanta Constitution and was later an editor at The Washington Post and The St. Petersburg Times.

headline.seo: Eugene C. Patterson, Editor and Civil Rights Crusader, Dies at 89
headline.main: Eugene C. Patterson, Editor and Civil Rights Crusader, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Eugene C. Patterson, Crusading Editor Who Sought to Change South, Dies at 89
